column3: February 18 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has assigned a rating of 'BBB-' to  General Motors Company's (GM) proposed issuance of $2 billion in senior  unsecured notes. The Issuer Default Rating (IDR) for GM is 'BBB-' and its Rating  Outlook is Stable. A full list of the ratings of GM and its subsidiaries is included at the end of  this release.
